name: nestopia_draft
description: **Nestopia** is a cutting-edge home rental website that facilitates direct interaction between buyers and sellers, eliminating the need for third-party intermediaries or broker charges. Built with the MERN stack, Nestopia leverages JWT for authentication, Socket.io for real-time chat functionality, and Dialogflow for an intelligent chatbot, creating a seamless and engaging user experience.

scripts.start-api: cd api && npm install && node index.js
scripts.start-client: cd client && npm install && npm run dev
